1.ara-name: كتاب الطهارة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Ibn Abbas narrated that :he saw the Prophet sleeping, while in the prostration position, until he snored or snorted. Then he stoodup to pray. So I said: "O Messenger of Allah! You were sleeping?" He said: "Wudu is not required except for sleeping while reclining. For when one reclines, joints relax

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْوُضُوءِ مِنَ النَّوْمِ
chapter.eng-name: [What Has Been Reported] About Wudu From Sleep
